snippet: The Times Company chief executive and former BBC head will be asked more questions about the now discontinued Digital Media Initiative.
abstract: New York Times Co president and chief executive Mark Thompson is being recalled by British Parliament to answer questions about testimony he gave in 2011 on program called Digital Media Initiative, which he oversaw when he was director general of British Broadcasting Corp.
lead_paragraph: The Times Company chief executive and former BBC head will be asked more questions about the now discontinued Digital Media Initiative.

headline.main: Times Co.’s Thompson to Testify in Parliament on BBC
headline.print_headline: Times Co.’s Thompson to Testify in Parliament on BBC
